music.vc_user_absent: 💢 You are not in a voice channel.
music.vc_user_different: 💢 You are not in the same voice channel as me.
music.paused: ⏸️ Paused the player. Use /pause again to resume.
music.search_age_restricted: 💢❌ This video is age restricted and cannot be played in a non-nsfw channel.
music.missing_permissions: It seems like I am missing the required permissions to use music features. Please ensure I am allowed to Connect, Speak, and view voice channels in this server.
music.no_songs: There are no songs in the queue. 🚫
music.all_users_gone: All users have left the voice channel. The player has been stopped.
music.error_music: An error occurred while trying to play music. Please try again later or contact the developer if errors persist.
music.no_previous: ⏪ There is no previous song to play.
music.no_current_queue: 🔇 There is no music currently being played.
music.already_joined: 💢 I am already in a voice channel!
music.could_not_join: ❌ I could not join the voice channel. Please ensure I have the required permissions to join and speak in the channel.
music.volume_syntax: ‼️ The volume cannot be higher than 100.
music.shuffle_too_few: ❌ You need at least 3 songs in the queue to shuffle.
music.export_error: ⚠️ Error exporting. Please ensure you have DMs enabled in this server.
music.export_success: ✅ Successfully exported the queue. Check your DMs.
music.remove_success: ✅🗑 Removed {song} at index {index} from the queue.
music.filter_invalid: ❌ Invalid filter. Please use the filter command without any arguments to see a list of available filters.
